name: Super Birthday Zeppelin
description:
The Super Birthday Zeppelin must deliver presents for the children!

But be careful. Those who have been naughty will have dangerous storm clouds above their homes!

CONTROLS: Arrow keys. Select Numbers: 1, 2 and 3. Throw presents: SPACE. Quit game: ESCAPE. Restart game: F5.

Super Birthday Zeppelin was created in under 8 hours at the HELLO SUMMER game jam at KADK.

*This is the official page for this title. Anywhere else where this title appears to be available is unofficial and I cannot guarantee that it is safe to download*.
